pkgmetadata.longdescription: What about running nose with a smarter interactive debugger? Use this and *never* risk yourself forgetting `import ipdb; ipdb.set_trace()` in your code again! This plugin is 99.99% based on nose's builtin debug plugin. If you have any ideas about how to improve it, come and fork the code at http://github.com/flavioamieiro/nose-ipdb
